column1: Draw a path like the robot is part of a military regimen and can't deviate from the group.
Draw a path like the robot is floating in outer space.
Draw a path where the robot is singularity focused on the destination.
Draw a path like the robot is ignoring the destination.
Draw a path like the robot is running late to a high-stakes event.
Draw a path like you're taking a leisurely walk.
Draw a path like the robot is moving against strong wind.
Draw a path like a feather drifting in a breeze.
